alert.note: Alert for Grant; Morton; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 6:09PM CST until December 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST/5 AM MST/ THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Heavy snow, freezing drizzle, and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 14 inches. Total ice accumulations as high as one tenth of an inch this evening through Tuesday morning. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Grant, Morton, and Sioux Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST/5 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dense fog will reduce visibility to one quarter mile or less this evening.
info.instruction: If you have travel plans tonight through Thursday, consider altering or cancelling your plans. If travel is absolutely necessary, be sure to carry a winter survival kit in your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
